name: Squat Box
how_to_perform:
1. Start by standing in front of a box (or bench) with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes facing forward.
2. Take a deep breath and slowly begin to lower yourself down onto the box, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
3. Lower your body until your thighs are parallel to the ground, aiming to descend to around 90-degrees from 180-degrees at the starting point.
4. Pause briefly at this position before initiating a controlled ascent.
5. Push yourself up off the box using your heels, ensuring that you fully straighten your legs and return to the starting position.
short_summary: The squat box is an exercise that targets the quadriceps muscles, glutes, hamstrings, calves, and lower back.
